rooms.name: Living and Dining Area (Open-Plan Kitchen)
rooms.description: This space serves as the central living area with an open-plan kitchen integrated seamlessly. Vastu principles are applied by placing the entrance on the north side to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located on the east for a calming and revitalizing environment, ensuring privacy with an attached ensuite bathroom. Budget-friendly finishes are applied to reduce costs without sacrificing comfort.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Placed on the south side, providing ample natural light from the west and a comfortable space for guest use.

rooms.name: Library / Study Room
rooms.description: Situated in a quiet corner of the ground floor, designed with built-in shelves and proper lighting to create an inspiring environment for reading and work. It follows Vastu guidelines by aligning its entrance with the northeast direction.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main door is positioned on the north side to invite positive energy according to Vastu.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large windows ensure ample natural light and ventilation.
